meta.title: Fairway Solitaire - Classic Cards Game
meta.description: Play the classic Fairway Solitaire card game - where golf meets solitaire for a unique gaming experience!

hero.title: Fairway Solitaire
hero.subtitle: Where Golf Meets Cards in a Classic Game of Strategy and Skill

howToPlay.title: How to Play
howToPlay.subtitle: Master the greens and the cards with these simple steps to play Fairway Solitaire

steps.title: Clear the Course
steps.description: Remove cards from the tableau by selecting cards that are one higher or lower than the current card on the waste pile.

steps.title: Use Golf Clubs
steps.description: Collect and use special golf clubs to remove difficult cards and clear obstacles from your path.

steps.title: Plan Your Strategy
steps.description: Look ahead and plan your moves carefully to create long chains of consecutive cards for bonus points.

steps.title: Beat the Hazards
steps.description: Watch out for sand traps and water hazards that can block your progress through the course.

steps.title: Complete the Course
steps.description: Clear all cards from the tableau to complete the hole and move on to the next challenging course.

steps.title: Earn Trophies
steps.description: Collect trophies and achievements by completing special challenges and beating your high scores.

testimonials.title: Player Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: See what our community of players has to say about Fairway Solitaire

mechanics.title: Solitaire Mechanics
mechanics.subtitle: Discover the unique gameplay elements that make Fairway Solitaire special

items.title: Card Sequencing
items.description: Cards can be played in ascending or descending order, giving you more options for strategic play than traditional solitaire games.

items.title: Golf Club Power-ups
items.description: Collect special golf clubs throughout the game that act as power-ups, helping you remove troublesome cards or create new opportunities.

items.title: Course Hazards
items.description: Navigate through sand traps, water hazards, and rough terrain that add challenging obstacles to your card-clearing journey.

items.title: Bonus Scoring
items.description: Create long chains of consecutive cards to earn bonus points and multipliers that can dramatically increase your score.

strategies.title: Winning Strategies
strategies.subtitle: Master these key strategies to improve your game and climb the leaderboards

items.title: Plan Ahead
items.description: Always look at the entire tableau before making your first move. Planning several moves ahead is key to creating long chains.

items.title: Save Your Clubs
items.description: Don't use your golf clubs immediately. Save them for situations where you're truly stuck or to clear particularly valuable cards.

items.title: Target Hazards First
items.description: Whenever possible, clear hazard cards early in the game before they can block your progress later on.

challenge.title: Fairway Challenge
challenge.subtitle: Ready to test your skills? Play Fairway Solitaire right here!
challenge.description: Experience the perfect blend of golf and solitaire in this addictive card game. Clear the course, use your golf clubs wisely, and aim for the highest score!
